attributes.action: Prevent  Michael Gove from running as Tory Leader and possibly becoming a PM
attributes.background: All those who share my opinion and believe that Michael Gove is the wrong man to be running as the Tory Leader and should not be in the competition to become this country's Prime Minister when David Cameron resigns in October.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
